text:
An! Lord God,

Thou hast made the heavens,
And the earth by Thy great power.
Ah! Lord God,

Thou hast made the heavens,
And the earth by Thine
outstretched arm.

Nothing is too difficult for Thee(2)
O great and mighty God,

Great in counsel and

mighty in deed,

Nothing, nothing,


absolutely nothing,
Nothing is too difficult for Thee.
b Kay Chance
